column5: I just got a new Ice Rod that my wife picked up from bills bait and tackle it a combo that she got for 12.99 it is actually a nice rod to shoukd check it out.
Bill's is a great shop. We have outfitted ourselves for ice fishing this year solely from them. The kids love going there to see the minnows and the dogs. Thanks Greg and Tim for setting us up.
You got that right. They have amazing service and anything you need if they don't have it they will get it for ya. An ya Greg and the other two in there are awesome.
going fishing for the first time in a few days so I was looking for a cheap combo. Picked one up from there today. Thanks for the tip!
No problem. By far the best combo.
